main event: A civilian reported observing a single unidentified object in Colorado Springs, Colorado for approximately 3 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on January 7, 1962., The object was observed to be southbound., It was noted that there was insufficient data for evaluation., The report mentioned three blinking lights, two red and one orange., The object appeared to hover and then moved southward out of sight.
sighted object: one unidentified object with three blinking lights
